attributes.additional_details: In view of the number of terrorist attacks this year, we the people feel our borders should be closed immediately to all people wishing to seek residence or  asylum in this Country and the ban should stay in place until a proper vetting system can be brought in to assess who is actually coming here.
attributes.background: We the People of the UK no longer feel safe whilst an open border policy is still in operation in this Country

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure that you mean by a "proper vetting system". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
